div.h3: COVID-19 Information from the School District

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-decoration-line: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;
letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-decoration-line: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;
span.strong: accessing resources and/or support during the COVID-19 related school closures?

p.span:
Please call 715-234-2181 ext 5262 to speak with someone
Mental Health Crisis Support:

Barron County Mental Health Crisis Line: 888-552-6642
SAMHSA Disaster Distress Helpline: 800-985-5590
National Suicide Prevention Lifeline: 800-273-8255
Trevor Lifeline for LGBTQ Youth: 866-488-7386
St. Vincent De Paul Help Line for Emergency Material Support: 715-736-1601
